item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-28 to the F.B.I.
item.description:
On 2022-12-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I.

From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.)

To: [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov, [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Cc: Edward Lehman, Muyi Xiao, Kevin Granville, Constant Méheut, David Enrich, Michael Forsythe

Bcc: Yves Strickler

Subject: NEW REFERENCE: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity

Date sent: 2022-12-28 at 14:49 Beijing time (+0800)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : ECtHRwatch < ecthrwatch@gmail.com >

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

CC : BeijingExec@state.gov, ParisExec@state.gov, [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 Beijing time

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald’s France was Péchenard & Associés, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald’s France was Péchenard & Associés, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Whistle-blower asking the F.B.I. if they received and kept the emails which were sent in 2015 and if they ever launched a criminal investigation against McDonald’s Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald’s Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the aggravated frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Email received from Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski – one of the FBI representatives in Beijing
item.description:
On 2021-09-20, I receive for the first time an email from Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski, “one of the FBI representatives in Beijing.”

FROM : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: Request to contact FBI office in Beijing

item.title: Email received from Mahonri MANJARREZ on September 08, 2021.
item.description:
Email received from Mahonri MANJARREZ (F.B.I.) on September 08, 2021.

FROM : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: Re: [EXTERNAL EMAIL] - carteconsulaire.png

item.title: F.B.I. Chicago answers the victim asking him to please contact the FBI's Public Access Line
item.description:
On 2015-12-18, I receive an answer from the Intake Unit of the Field Office of the F.B.I. in Chicago.

FROM : Chicago@ic.fbi.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: RE: McDonald’s massive fraud in Europe
